description: Numerators of coefficients in expansion of sqrt(sin(x)/x) (even powers only).
links: Weisstein Eric W. The Sinc Function, Wolfram Mathworld.
maple: A008991 := n -> numer(coeff(taylor(sqrt(sin(x)/x), x, 2*n+2), x, 2*n)):  seq(A008991(n), n=0..16); # [_Johannes W. Meijer_, Feb 10 2013]
prog: (Sage)len = 16; T = taylor(sqrt(sin(x)/x),x,0,2*len+2)[T.coeff(x,2*n).numerator() for n in (0..len)]# _Peter Luschny_, Dec 13 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
